https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t4ZxX0lZD8JpHU5pjQ5aMM7Mcj.jpg ADM:DOP (Anthony Dod Mantle - Director of Photography) is an impressionistic look into the creative life and vision of cinematographer Anthony Dod Mantle, the genius eye behind Harmony Korine's Julien Donkey-Boy, Lars von Trier's Dogville, Danny Boyle's 28 Days Later and Thomas Vinterberg's first two features, Festen and It's All About Love. ADM: DOP
